amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the new nuclear-armed cruise missile by $167.050 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to apply $167,050,000 to the savings reduction account for the new nuclear arm cruise missile.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Quigley amendment (A030) Failed by recorded vote: 164 - 257 (Roll no. 203).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Quigley amendment (A030) Failed by recorded vote: 164 - 257 (Roll no. 203).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A030) offered by Mr. Quigley.
